data.name: Dstroy 2
data.detailed_description:
Dstroy 2 is a bombermania local multiplayer game. Sequel of Dstroy, our first game release in 1995 on Msdos.

It will have two Main modes, Adventures (solo or coop) and Tournaments (Vs 2 to 4 players). For now we're mostly working on the local Tournament modes (player VS players), and, a solo or coop Survival mode too.

We're aiming for a "free to play" approach so the maximum of players can enjoy the game. We're hopping to find a good idea for fans to financially reward us too, but We're not there yet anyway!

A decent online mode might only be consider if the game get attention from enough players to be worth the investment. The game will be fully Steam Remote Play compatible until then.
